## Homepage

This is homepage of my website. The website is an biosketch of myself. I am a biostatistician
at Division of Biostatistics, Karolinska Institutet. I obtained my medical degree from Xiamen University
in 2019, and master degree in Global Health from Karolinska Institutet in 2020. I have been engaged in
over 20 research projects and resulted in good journals. My current expertise in biostatistics
is on Registry data management, linear regression, structural models and classification methods.
